headline: Hi, I'm Michael. I'm passionate about building things that are powerful, intuitive, and clean.
article:
I am well-organized, resourceful, and driven. I love to learn new and exciting things and see my skills come to life through design and function. I see every programming task as an opportunity to find a creative and robust solution.
I am a self-taught developer, which I consider one of my greatest strengths. I’m a fast and adaptive learner, and I take responsibility to solve problems and get things done. My skills and knowledge are built on the resources I’ve sought out, and are always growing.
tagline: I'd love to be an asset to your team.
